udumbara：m．[〃] 優曇婆羅，優曇華，無花果．
udumbara：m．[〃] 優曇婆羅，優曇華，無花果，いちじく．
Udumbara，【陽】叢生榕（東印度的一種無花果（Ficus Glomerata），常作為一種遮蔭樹而栽培，葉漸尖，果紅色，成小叢，樹皮有收斂性）。（p69）
Udumbara，（Sk．udumbara），【陽】無花果（the glomerous fig tree，Ficus Glomerata優曇鉢果）。

udumbara： udumbara（pu）
ဥဒုမ္ဗရ（ပု）
«yādicchaka．udumbara+ṇa¿»
[ယာဒိစ္ဆကနာမ်။ ဥဒုမ္ဗရ+ဏ¿]

udumbara： udumbara（pu，na）
ဥဒုမ္ဗရ（ပု၊န）
«u+dubbī+ara．niggalā，ba khye．，ṭī，551．（2） u+du+vara=a．vi，pi，»
[ဥ+ဒုဗ္ဗီ+အရ။ နိဂ္ဂဟိတ်လာ၊ ဗ တစ်လုံး ချေ။ ဓာန်၊ ဋီ၊ ၅၅၁။ （၂） ဥ+ဒု+ဝရ=အ။ ဝိ၊ပိ၊ဓာန်]
Udumbara，[Sk．udumbara] the glomerous fig tree，Ficus Glomerata D．II，4； Vin．IV，35； A．IV，283 （°khādika），283 （id．），324 （id．）； Sn．5； DhA．I，284； SnA 19； KhA 46，56； VvA．213．Cp．odumbara．（Page 135）

Udumbara：Wife of Pinguttara．She was the daughter of a teacher in Takkasilā and was given to Pinguttara because he was the eldest pupil．But he was unhappy with her，and on the way to his home，when she climbed up a fig （udumbara） tree to pluck fruits for herself，he put thorns round the tree and ran away，leaving her．The king，coming along，saw her and married her．She was called Udumbara-devi because of the circumstances in which she was found．When the king suspected her of infidelity to him，Mahosadha saved her from ignominy，and she became thereafter his best friend and helped him in all his doings，treating him，with the king’s permission，as her younger brother．When the king planned to kill Mahosadha，Udumbara-devi warned him in time and enabled him to evade the treachery of his enemies at court （J．vi．348，352，355，363，368，384）．

In the present age she was Ditthamangalikā （J．vi．478）．

Udumbara：1．Udumbara．-A thera of Makuva，author of a tīkā on the Petakopadesa．Gv．75，65．

2．Udumbara．-A village．Revata went there from Kannakujja and stopped there before proceeding to Aggalapura and Sahajāti．Thither the Elders followed him to ask his opinion on the Vajjian heresy．Vin．ii．299．

udumbara：ဥဒုမ္ဗရ（ပု၊န）
[ဥ+ဒုဗ္ဗီ+အရ။ နိဂ္ဂဟိတ်လာ၊ ဗ တစ်လုံး ချေ။ ဓာန်၊ ဋီ၊ ၅၅၁။ （၂） ဥ+ဒု+ဝရ=အ။ ဝိ၊ပိ၊ဓာန်]
（၁） ရေသဖန်းပင်။ （န） （၂） ရေသဖန်းသီး။

udumbara：ဥဒုမ္ဗရ（ပု）
[ယာဒိစ္ဆကနာမ်။ ဥဒုမ္ဗရ+ဏ¿]
ဥဒုမ္ဗရ မည်သောမြို့။

udumbara：ဥဒုမ္ဗရ （ပ）
